title: Japanese Language on euw
body:
I love watching animes and sometimes i watch streams on korean
Server and realise that the Voice of the Champions are the Same 
Pls Riot put all Languages on the euw Server i Need to put it in 
Japanese**

replies.body:
Heya
First of, this is the German Forum. So if you dont talk about Bratwurst and Sauerkraut you gonna have a hard time. ;)
Furthermore there is the Option to get the japanese soundpack. Just google for soundchange tutorials. Here is one for the korean soundpack http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/23oafv/changing_your_ingame_sounds_to_korean/
There is mentioned that there is no japanese Soundpack but i am not sure if this information is still correct.

Regards Rkoturdo

Ach so dachte w채re die ammi Community :)
Und dank dir :)

Heya

http://fs2.directupload.net/images/150323/8jfujix9.jpg
*hust hust*
